underlying_goal: To improve the clarity and narrative of a research presentation slide deck for a mentor meeting.
friction_detail: Claude initially reframed a slide title to 'C3 Is Robust to Adversarial Prompts,' which was an overstatement of the actual findings. The user had to correct this to a more precise conclusion about 'Consistency-Improving Prompts'.
primary_success: Applying the research-presentation skill to systematically critique and rewrite presentation slides, transforming them from activity-focused updates to a clear, outcome-driven narrative with explicit success/failure framing.
brief_summary: The user requested help clarifying a research presentation for a mentor. Using its presentation skill, Claude critiqued the slides for clarity and narrative flow, then implemented changes to be more outcome-focused. After a user correction to scope a claim more precisely, the final slides were significantly improved.
